mapper.select:
select pr.*, ae.nick_name as examineUser, aa.nick_name as applyUser, d.depname from ams_process pr left join ums_admin ae on pr.examine_user_id = ae.id left join ums_admin aa on pr.apply_user_id = aa.id left join ums_department d on pr.department_id = d.id
pr.status = 1 and (pr.examine_user_id = #{currentAdminId} or pr.apply_user_id = #{currentAdminId})
and pr.apply_type_id = #{applyTypeId}
and pr.name like concat('%', #{nameKeyword}, '%')
order by pr.priority desc, pr.create_time desc

select distinct pr.*, ae.nick_name as examineUser, aa.nick_name as applyUser, d.depname from ams_process pr left join ums_admin ae on pr.examine_user_id = ae.id left join ums_admin aa on pr.apply_user_id = aa.id left join ams_process_examine_user pue on pr.id = pue.process_id left join ums_department d on pr.department_id = d.id
pr.status != 1 and (pue.examine_user_id = #{currentAdminId} or pr.apply_user_id = #{currentAdminId})
and pr.apply_type_id = #{applyTypeId}
and pr.name like concat('%', #{nameKeyword}, '%')
order by pr.priority desc, pr.create_time desc

select pr.*, ae.nick_name as examineUser, aa.nick_name as applyUser, d.depname from ams_process pr left join ums_admin ae on pr.examine_user_id = ae.id left join ums_admin aa on pr.apply_user_id = aa.id left join ums_department d on pr.department_id = d.id where pr.id=#{id}
